charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1101_010:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
around town, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Sidney and a
street thug having a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_020:
Heh, that was fun! You really got us good! That
Absol of yours really came in like a disaster, as
they say...
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_030:
Oh, come on. Don’t tell me you actually believe
those superstitions!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_040: Hahaha! Nah, I’m just kiddin’ with ya.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_050:
Only old fogies still believe that stuff. Anyways,
gotta go! See ya.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_060:
Yo, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Did I keep you
waiting or something?
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_0401_080:
You must’ve heard what we were talking
about, huh?
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_0302_090: What was that about a disaster?
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_0402_100:
So you overheard that... I guess that would be
alarming to hear. “Disaster” is a pretty loaded
word, after all...
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_110:
Y’see, there’s this superstition about Absol. People
used to believe that it brought disasters.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_120:
Reason being, natural disasters like earthquakes
and tidal waves would always happen whenever
it appeared.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_130:
But actually, Absol can sense incoming disasters
with their horn, and they would come down from
the mountains to warn people.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_140:
Ain’t that right, buddy? That’s actually how the
two of us met!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_150:
A while back, I was up in the mountains when
Absol came outta nowhere and tried to chase me
outta there!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_160:
At the time, I thought he was dangerous, so I 
fought back with my own Pokémon. But he just
wouldn’t budge.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_170:
Eventually, he drove us all the way down the
mountain.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_180:
And right when we left, there was a huge
avalanche on that mountain! I nearly jumped
outta my skin!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_190:
When things calmed down, this guy tried to go
back into the mountains like it was nothing.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_200:
As I was watching him walk away, I realized I
wanted to team up with him.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_0401_220:
Well, because he was so cool! It sent shivers
down my spine!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_0402_240:
Yeah! But I didn’t just want to rely on him... I
wanted to let him know I can support him, too!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_250:
My partner is strong. No matter what anyone says
about him or how badly he’s misunderstood, he
never wavers in his beliefs.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_260:
Guys who have something to believe in are strong.
That’s why we put our all into enjoying battles.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_270:
As long as I’m with Absol, there’s never a
dull moment!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_280:
I also can’t deny the fact that we’re pretty similar.
People used to call me a delinquent back in
the day.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_0401_300:
Right? I’m not one to talk clichés, but it really was
destiny that we met.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_0302_310: It’s great that you two met!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_0402_320:
Yeah! You can search far and wide, but you’ll
never find a partner as strong and reliable as him!
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_330:
No matter what anyone says about us, we’ll never
back down. Our will is strong.
charaepi_ch0135_00_kagetsu/2301_1201_340:
We know that’s the most important thing
to believe! And we’re gonna keep on
pushing forward!
